original_text: ‘Some people say that they are prophets from God. But their words are false. They seem to be like sheep that are not dangerous. But they are really like hungry wild dogs. What they teach will hurt you.
korean_text: 거짓 선지자들을 삼가라 양의 옷을 입고 너희에게 나아오나 속에는 노략질하는 이리라

sentences.original_text: Some people say that they are prophets from God
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 자신들이 하나님으로부터 온 예언자라고 말합니다

sentences.original_text: They seem to be like sheep
But they are really like hungry wild dogs
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 실제로는 굶주린 들개와 같습니다

sentences.original_text: What they teach will hurt you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 가르치는 것은 당신에게 해를 줄 것입니다
